function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective screening criteria leads to inclusion of irrelevant articles","Impact":"Inclusion of irrelevant articles may skew the results and conclusions of the review","Mitigation":"Implement clear and precise screening criteria to ensure only relevant articles are included","Technologies":"Screening software with advanced search and filter capabilities","People":"Reviewers, researchers","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Exclusion of relevant articles based on abstract and title screening","Impact":"Relevant articles may be missed, leading to incomplete understanding of the topic","Mitigation":"Utilize multiple reviewers and clear inclusion/exclusion criteria to reduce bias","Technologies":"Collaborative review platforms, automated screening tools","People":"Reviewers, research team","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Exclusion of relevant articles during data extraction","Impact":"Important data and insights may be missed, leading to incomplete analysis","Mitigation":"Implement thorough and systematic data extraction processes, and utilize multiple reviewers for validation","Technologies":"Data extraction software with validation features","People":"Data extractors, reviewers","Owner":"Research team"}]}
